thread.title: Robot revolution sweeps China's factory floors
thread.title_full: Robot revolution sweeps China's factory floors

title: Robot revolution sweeps China's factory floors
text: Robot revolution sweeps China's factory floors By Associated Press | September 23, 2015 @ 12:28 am In this Aug. 21, 2015 photo, a Chinese worker is seated next to orange robot arms at Rapoo Technology factory in southern Chinese industrial boomtown of Shenzhen. Factories in China are rapidly replacing those workers with automation, a pivot that's encouraged by rising wages and new official directives aimed at helping the country move away from low-cost manufacturing as the supply of young, pliant workers shrinks. (AP Photo/Vincent Yu)
